title: New U.S. COVID guidelines allow most Americans to go mask-free indoors
description: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention on Friday dramatically eased its COVID-19 guidelines for when Americans should wear masks indoors, a move that means 72% of the U.S. population will reside in communities where indoor face coverings are no l…
